DeviceList was built to fill a need of u: DeviceList was built to fill a need of used devices for consumers and businesses across Canada. We are a B2B and B2C online marketplace dedicated to mobile devices such as phones and tablets. We’ve built a trusted network of certified retail partners that have been in the industry for over 25 years. Our team has over 10 Years of dedicated experience in the mobile device retail and repair industry.
DeviceList is for everyone. From consume: DeviceList is for everyone. From consumers looking for a quality used device, or a business looking to sell or purchase used mobile devices in bulk. We are the most trusted and simple way to get a secondary phone. Search our inventory and find the phone you want, make your purchase, then pick your delivery date.

What condition will the battery be in?: What condition will the battery be in?
Each battery is inspected and tested to: Each  battery is inspected and tested to make sure it reaches at least 80% of its initial charging capacity or more. If it does not meet this standard, the battery is automatically replaced by a new one. In case you’re not satisfied with your battery’s performance you can make good use of our (included) 12 month warranty.
What does your 12 month warranty cover a: What does your 12 month warranty cover and how does it work?
Our 12 month warranty comes free with th: Our 12 month warranty comes free with the sale of every device sold on DeviceList. This warranty covers malfunctions or defects that aren’t caused by damage or misuse by the user. The warranty covers loose or weak battery, buttons that sink, a faulty touch screen, and more. The warranty does not cover: software issues, water damage, accidental damage, broken or smashed LCD, and pixel loss. If the device is dropped and breaks, the warranty will not apply.
How to use the warranty: 1) if you have: How to use the warranty: 1) if you have an issue with your device, log into your DeviceList account 2) Once logged In click on the My Dashboard, then click on RMA Requests 3) The return system will guide you on how to process your return.
How long will it take to get my package?: How long will it take to get my package?
Purolator Ground typically takes 1-5 Bus: Purolator Ground typically takes 1-5 Business days depending on your area. Purolator Express typically takes 1-2 business days depending on your area.
